item.name: Design a SOA Composite Application
item.description: Learn how to design a SOA composite application, create an application deployment profile for it, and deploy it.

item.name: Design an SOA Composite for Oracle B2B
item.description: Add a B2B binding component to a SOA composite application by accessing the binding component and selecting the document definition for the service.

item.name: Create an ADF Page With Oracle BAM Data Control
item.description: Learn how to create an ADF page using an Oracle BAM data control to display real-time data in your application.

item.name: Developer's Guide for Oracle SOA Suite
item.description: Learn how to build an SOA composite application with the components that comprise Oracle SOA Suite.

item.name: Consume a Web Service from a Web Page
item.description: Create a data control from a web service, test the web service, and run a page that consumes the data control.

item.name: Create a Web Service from a Java Class
item.description: Use the bottom-up approach to create a web service from a Java class.

item.name: Create a Java Web Service from a WSDL
item.description: Use the top-down approach to create a Java web service from a WSDL.

item.name: Learn about JDeveloper and Web Services
item.description: Discover and use existing web services, and develop and deploy new web services.

item.name: Configure Connections to Use with Web Services
item.description: Define and manage connections to a public or private UDDI registry.
